title: Workshop on Applying Instructional Design Models for Assessment Literacy Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Language assessment theory and basic instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: A course for systematically acquiring assessment education pedagogies in blended learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically conduct assessment instructional design by applying the ADDIE model.
Learners can develop three or more assessment strategies reflecting adult learner (andragogy) characteristics.
Learners can design and implement formative assessment tools using digital tools at least once.
Learners can develop five or more summative assessment items within a language assessment education context.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
